items.name: Web Development Certification
items.description: This certification introduced me to the core concepts of modern web development, including frontend and backend technologies. I gained hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and explored responsive design, accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility. I also built interfaces using React and connected them with backend services via REST APIs. The course enhanced my understanding of databases, server logic, and the full-stack development lifecycle. It provided real-world practice through projects and exercises that reflected common development challenges.
